## Problem Statement

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. (e.g., "I find it frustrating when...")

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution or feature you'd like.
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered, and why you prefer your proposed solution.

## Use Case

Describe the real-world scenario where this feature would be useful. Who would benefit from it, and how?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.
